project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Read the text file and load its contents
Process the text to count the frequency of each word
Identify the top 10 most common words
Display the top 10 most common words in the terminal
Write tests to ensure correct functionality of the word counting logic
Execute tests to verify the functionality of the word frequency counter program
